FuncDef:
The advertise link-attributes disable command configures OSPF to withdraw the advertisement of a specified type of TLV.
The undo advertise link-attributes disable command enables OSPF to advertise TLVs of a specified type. The advertise link-attributes disable command configures OSPF to withdraw the advertisement of a specified type of TLV. The undo advertise link-attributes disable command enables OSPF to advertise TLVs of a specified type. By default, OSPF advertises Local/Remote Interface ID Sub-TLV and Remote IPv4 Address Sub-TLVs.
CLIs: undo advertise link-attributes { interface-id | remote-ip } disable

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the Local/Remote Interface ID Sub-TLV.
-

Specifies the Remote IPv4 Address Sub-TLV.
-
